external_games.name: Train Simulator: Riviera Line in the Fifties: Exeter - Kingswear Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Riviera Line in the Fifties: Exeter - Kingswear Route Add-On
summary: Incorporated by an Act of Parliament in 1835, the origins of the Great Western Railway lay with merchants from Bristol who felt threatened by the growing strength of Liverpool as a major trading port through its development of a railway connection to London.
